sect1.title: Internal Component Design
sect1.para: The component OperationCycleMenagement consists of only the following SW unit: OperationCycleMenagement The architectural overview of the component is described within the SWA at the following location in Enterprise Architect: VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ServiceLayer.DiagServices.Diagnosis.SW Architecture.Components.OperationCycleManagement.SW Architecture

sect1.title: Requirements Allocation
sect1.para: The component covers requirement present in the module 5.1.1.SWR-L3_CRoute_Diagnostic. The requirements present in chapter 2.1.1 Central Aging Counter, 3.4.1 Preconditions and abort conditions, 2.2.3.3.1 Operation cycles & 2.2.3.3.2 Aging Counter is covered by this component. see Component Diagram "Requirements traceability" in SWA at the following location in Enterprise Architect: VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ServiceLayer.DiagServices.Diagnosis.SW Architecture.Components.OperationCycleManagement.SW Requirements

sect1.title: Software Unit Interfaces
sect1.para: The component consists of only one unit. There is no unit interface description needed.

sect1.title: Software Unit Interaction
sect1.para: The component consists of only one unit. There is no unit interface description needed.

sect1.title: Data flow Diagram
sect1.para: The diagram below presents the major dataflow from the module.
The component OperationCycleMenagement provides only one interface that is called cyclically by OSTask "DiagTask" (period = 10ms) Interrupts
There is no event-handling designed. Operating Modes
There are no special operation modes used. Power Modes
There is no special power mode used. Exception and Error Handling
A special exception or error handling is not necessary. Synchronization
A special synchronization method is not necessary. Operations
The operations are mentioned in the proper function description.
